caption:
Making a case against a fire truck driver is complex due to laws prioritizing their right-of-way in emergencies, allowing them to bypass specific traffic rules. 

Despite these challenges, it’s possible to succeed if you can demonstrate adherence to safety protocols while the accident occurred due to the driver’s negligence. 

For professional guidance, consider consulting our truck accident lawyers at 800-500-0000.
